name: learn_emotional_reactions
description: Analyzes input to detect and learn emotional reactions, which are responses to stimuli that manifest as expressions, behaviors, or physiological changes.

text_input.description: The text input describing the situation or event that led to the emotional reaction, to provide context for the analysis. This is optional.

audio_input.description: The audio input, in base64 format, capturing vocal emotional reactions to be analyzed. This is optional.

image_input.description: The image input, in base64 format, capturing the emotional reactions to be analyzed.

video_input.description: The video input, in base64 format, capturing the emotional reactions to be analyzed. This is optional.
